content:
XmlSpace Enum

Definition

Specifies the current xml:space scope.

In this Article

public enum XmlSpace
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
XmlSpace

Fields

Default

The xml:space scope equals default.
None

No xml:space scope.
Preserve

The xml:space scope equals preserve.
